text: how to get unique values set from a repeating values list
I need to parse a large log file (flat file), which contains  two column of values (column-A , column-B).
Values in both columns are repeating.
I need to find for each unique value in column-A , I need to find a set of column-B values.
Is this can be done using unix shell command or need to write any perl or python script?
What are the ways this can be done?

code:
xxxA 2
xxxA 1
xxxB 2
XXXC 3
XXXA 3
xxxD 4
